advantageCards.title: Excellent reputation.
advantageCards.description: The Arda Real Estate Consulting reputation among investors was formed by our  Research group and has been reinforced by our Consulting team by providing well thought-out, unbiased commendations and advice.

advantageCards.title: Experienced team.
advantageCards.description: Our Consulting group is led by a senior management team each with 20+ years of  direct executive level homebuilding,  development, and consulting experience.

advantageCards.title: National Footprint.
advantageCards.description: Many of our clients operate throughout the country. We are one of the largest and most geographically diverse consulting groups  which allows us to best service their needs.

advantageCards.title: Excellent Service.
advantageCards.description: Often times our clients do not have full control over  timing for their deals and the Consulting  team has a knack for making miracles happen.
